summary:
I am a storyteller who does not commit to one medium, although my favorites being wood, clay, film and resin. My work is very personal and often driven by my neuro divergent brain. 
I'm a rebel that likes rules. Not those vague rules set by society, but the rules set by subcultures.

ORIGIN STORY
I was about 6 years old when I attended my first funeral. While sitting there, next to my parents, I realised that nobody lives forever. I cried my little eyes out. Not because I was sad this far uncles passed away. 
No, I didn't even remember what he looked like, but because of the idea that nobody would ever knew I existed. 

Back home I ran to my dad's office, grabbed a big black marker and put it safely in my pocket. 
From that moment on I felt the urge to leave my name everywhere I went, so I would not be forgotten.

At age 9, I was playing outside with this kid from my neighbourhood. He found a graffiti can in the bushes. We ran to the alley behind his house.
I was watching while he wrote the only english word he knew on the wall of his house. DEATH. 
His parents were furious! But I found it fascinating. 
My love for graffiti started growing there and then. The streets tell so many stories. A hidden society that talks to each other through walls.
Take my hand and let's wander the streets in the nice and quiet. When everybody sleeps, we are the ones that start talking.

treasury_media.title: Lord of Losers
treasury_media.description:
Join my cult. We are all neuro divergent here. You are safe with me.
We are family, we got snacks.

Welcome to The Neurodivergent Playground.

treasury_media.title: PANIC ATTACK - The Panics
treasury_media.description:
This is a video made for production company The Panics in Amsterdam.
The Awkward Party is on their listed in their "House of Panic" roster.
The video aired December 2022 as a part of their social media shorts: "Panic Attack".

treasury_media.title: The Fastfood Trio
treasury_media.description:
Bustes van componisten, gevonden in de kringloop. 
Jongeren kennen tegenwoordig Bach, Strauss of Mozart niet meer.
Wel kennen ze Ronal McDonald (McDonalds), Kolonel Sanders (KFC) en The King (Burger King).

treasury_media.title: Detail shot kunstwerk "Sex, Drugs & Money"
treasury_media.description:
Dit is een houtwerk van 5 lagen multiplex. 
Het werk is gebaseerd op mijn diagnose ADHD/ASS.
ADHDers zijn vaak verslavinggevoelig. Zo is zo'n 60% verslaafd aan sex, drugs/drank, gokken etc.
De kenmerkende oogjes zijn in meer werken te zien. Ze kijken altijd omhoog en kijken je nooit aan. 
Dit is een typisch kenmerk van autisme.

treasury_media.title: Becky Bulldozer
treasury_media.description:
Deze docu is gemaakt in het kader van Teledoc Campus voor BNN.

Documentaire over de onzekerheden van regisseuse Steffie Storms. Lukt het haar om haar onzekerheden te overwinnen met de kei harde sport Roller Derby?

Geselecteerd voor de Debuutcompetitie op het NFF.

treasury_media.title: Creating Alter ego's (screenshot "We Own This City")
treasury_media.description:
Ego documentary "We Own This City" about the illegal graffiti history of filmmaker Steffie Storms. 
http://www.npo.nl/brabantdoc/16-09-2012/REG_BRAB_TV1150821

awards.title: Geselecteerd voor de Debuutcompetitie NFF
awards.description: Geselecteerd voor de debuut competitie van het Nederlands Film Festival met de documentaire Becky Bulldozer. Een docu gerealiseerd voor BNN/VARA.

awards.title: Teledoc Campus Realisation fund
awards.description: Teledoc campus rewards young documentary filmmakers with a realization fund after judging their written film plan. Steffie won this fund with her filmscript 'Becky Bulldozer', a film about the therapeutic way Roller Derby Helps young woman with their daily fears and well being. This film will be made for television network BNN.

awards.title: Teledoc campus research fund
awards.description: Teledoc campus rewards young documentary filmmakers with a research fund after judging their written film plan. Steffie won this fund with her film idea 'Becky Bulldozer', a film about the therapeutic way Roller Derby Helps young woman with their daily fears and well being. In september all winning plans will be judged again to see if they can get the fund to realize their films.

awards.title: Brabantse Beauty's Documentaries
awards.description: Omroep Brabant reward filmmakers in Brabant with a starters fund to make their movies after pitching their film ideas. Out of the 17 pitchers, Steffie was one of the three chosen filmmakers that were rewarded with this prize. Steffie won with her film idea 'Becky Bulldozer', a film about the therapeutic way Roller Derby helps young women with their daily fears and well being.

awards.title: Brabantse Beauty's Documentaires
awards.description:
Steffie won a money prize with her documentary pitch for her graduation film idea. With the money she could finance her film.
The documentary is a personal document on her history with graffiti, and why she stopped doing it because of her boyfriend. 
This film shows the struggle with the idea of going back in this underground subculture. 
‘We Own This City’ was broadcast throughout the region on september 16th 2012.

profile_positions.description: What diffirends The Awkward Party’s work is the mixed media approach to her work. She dabbles in everything from documentary to animation to woodworking, epoxy and graffiti. Fascinated by subcultures and underground scenes, her work is often characterised by a raw, grungy style.
profile_positions.title: Kunstenaar

profile_positions.description: Docwerk is a platform for young film talents that are in the starting fase of their careers. With a group of 5 to 6 people they will develop 12 short documentary films. 6 columns of 3 minutes and 6 portraits of 12 minutes. The shorts Steffie made are: MCHNRY and I.Drink.Blood. These documentaries will be broadcasted by Omroep Brabant in july 2016.
profile_positions.title: Documentary filmmaker

profile_positions.description: Internship at Martin & Inge Riebeek. Editing, subtitels and sounddesign.
profile_positions.title: Internship

profile_positions.description: Internship at 'Lumineus Film Productions'. Runner on set, graphic designer for DVD box, and researcher for '10.000 verhalen van Liefde' (10.000 stories of love).
profile_positions.title: Internship

profile_positions.description:
Internship at Boschtion media (local television). Hosting a TV show called 'Steffie waar ben je nou' (Steffie where are you) to promote lesser known sports and activities like sword-fighting, capoeira etc.
Besides that, reporting for other running shows.
profile_positions.title: Internship
